actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

official_title: To extend until January 1, 1995, the existing reduction of duty on certain paper products.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on toilet paper, handkerchiefs, cleansing or facial tissues or towels, all of cellulose webbing or webs of cellulose fibers, in rolls of a width exceeding 15 cm.

titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1995, the existing reduction of duty on certain paper products.
